sentence: Walker is running to unseat Democratic Senator Raphael Warnock while Perdue is challenging Republican Governor Brian Kemp.
author: Alexandra Hutzler
title: How to Watch Trump Michigan Rally: Time, Live Stream for GOP Event

sentence: In a Monday statement, Trump said the debate was a BIG win for David Perdue, who exposed Brian Kemp as the RINO that we all know him to be.? Trump identified Perdue as the only Republican who can defeat Stacey The Hoax Abrams,? and said: It also showed how important it is for the MAGA voters to go and support David Perdue in the Election.
author: Hannah Bleau
title: Donald Trump: Georgia Debate a BIG Win for Perdue, Exposed Brian Kemp as RINO
